author: Rylee Kirk | rkirk@syracuse.com
title: 21-year-old SUNY Potsdam music student shot dead near campus; police looking for shooter - syracuse.com
description: The student attended the SUNY Potsdam Crane School of Music, played the cello and was set to graduate this year.
content:
Potsdam, N.Y. A SUNY Potsdam music education student was fatally shot near campus Friday, according to State Police and university officials.
Elizabeth Howell, 21, of Patterson in Putnam County, wasâ€¦ [+1857 chars]
